articles.title: DPRK, Russia Declare 2015 as Friendship Year
articles.content:
DPRK, Russia Declare 2015 as Friendship Year
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Russian Federation decided to make 2015 in which fall the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the victory in the great Patriotic War in Russia as a year of friendship between the two countries, prompted by the purpose to develop the bilateral relations onto a new higher stage in various fields including politics, economy and culture under a mutual agreement.
					 During the year of friendship the two countries are to invigorate exchanges of delegations and contacts between national institutions and regions and hold joint cultural events in Pyongyang and Moscow and other cities of the two countries.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a reply message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Monday.
					 The Syrian president in his message expressed thanks to Kim Jong Un for extending warm congratulations to him on the 52nd anniversary of the March 8 revolution in the Syrian Arab Republic and to the government and people of the DPRK.
					
					 He also expressed thanks to Kim Jong Un for expressing conviction that the Syrian people would achieve the victory in the fight against the challenge of hostile forces inside and outside the country and highly appreciated Kim Jong Un and the friendly DPRK's stand of supporting the just cause of Syria.
					
					 He expressed sincere hope that Kim Jong Un would always enjoy good health and happiness and the people of the DPRK would achieve greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Mauritius
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Mauritius
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam,  president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Mar. 6 sent a message of greeting to  Rajkeshwur Purryag, president of the Republic of Mauritius, on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of its independence and the 23rd anniversary of the proclamation of its Republic.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields and sincerely wished the president, government and people of Mauritius successes in their efforts for the progress and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: DPRK Pays Efforts to Int'l Exchange through Trade Fair
articles.content:
DPRK Pays Efforts to Int'l Exchange through Trade Fair
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Korean International Exhibition Corporation concentrates efforts on strengthened international exchange through trade fair, pursuant to the DPRK state policy on fostering the external economic relations in a multilateral way.
					 The Corporation has hosted international trade fairs in the capital city of Pyongyang in spring and autumn every year.
					
					 The spring trade fair for this year will take place on May 11-14 and the autumn trade fair on September 21-24, according to Ho Pyong Chol, a department head of the Corporation.
					
					 Noting that the world public interest in those trade fairs has grown deeper in recent years, he told KCNA:
					
					 The participants in the Pyongyang spring and autumn international trade fairs increase in number every year. So, we are now pushing ahead with a work to expand the venue for them.
					
					 This year will also see various trade fairs co-sponsored in Pyongyang by the DPRK and other countries, including a German trade fair on November 2-5.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Admit and Make Reparation for Its Hideous Crimes against Humanity
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Admit and Make Reparation for Its Hideous Crimes against Humanity
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The recently disclosed information about confession made by a service member of the Imperial Japanese Army in an interrogation after being captured by "allied forces" serve as another clear evidence proving the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary.
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The human history records many wars but never knows such a terrible war crime as the one the Japanese imperialists perpetrated by forcing a lot of women of other nations into sexual slavery. 
					
					 A criminal should make an apology and reparation for his wrongdoings.
					
					 Japan should honestly admit its thrice-cursed crimes against humanity and make reparation for them.
					
					 But it is working hard to deny and distort its past history, far from admitting its crimes and make reparation for them.
					
					 There is a saying that a gimlet in a bag is bound to protrude.
					
					 A historical fact can never be written off nor a crime be covered up.
					
					 There is no statute of limitations to the crimes against humanity.
					
					 The history of crimes the Japanese imperialists perpetrated against the Korean nation is being remembered by Koreans with more towering resentment.
					
					 Japan should roll back its wrong policy as early as possible and sincerely admit, apologize and make adequate reparation for its past crimes, though belatedly.

articles.title: Hero Airman Remembered by DPRK People
articles.content:
Hero Airman Remembered by DPRK People
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Kil Yong Jo is one of the DPRK heroes always remembered by its people.
					 Born into a serviceman's family in May 1963, he had been active as an airman of the Korean People's Army until December 1992.
					
					 While performing his flight duty as a pilot, he came to face a danger due to a plane breakdown. He was ordered to bail out from the plane but chose the death to ensure the security of the headquarters of revolution.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il recalled Kil's heroic deed, when visiting his unit in April 2001, and instructed officials to move the graves of Kil and other heroes into the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery.
					
					 He also saw to it that the bust of Kil Yong Jo was erected at his alma mater and the school was called after his name and that feature film and song telling about his life and heroic feats were created. 
					
					 On March 2 this year Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited a unit of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force and highly estimated the heroic spirit displayed by Kil. And he said the spirit is the most precious mental asset that can be bartered with nothing.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Denounce U.S.-S. Korea Nuclear War Exercises against DPRK
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Denounce U.S.-S. Korea Nuclear War Exercises against DPRK
PTokyo, March 9 (KNS-KCNA) -- Chairpersons of the prefectural headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Monday made public statements in denunciation of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers' nuclear war exercises for invading the DPRK. 
					 Hwang Myong, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, said the joint military drills aiming at "removing" the headquarters of the DPRK and "occupying Pyongyang" are extremely reckless and dangerous nuclear war exercises as they involve the U.S. imperialist forces deployed in south Korea and its vicinity and hundreds of thousands of the south Korean puppet forces and troops of satellite countries. 
					
					 Pu Yong Uk, chairman of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, urged the south Korean warmongers who, being subservient to the U.S., turned out as a shock brigade for a war against the north to stop at once the reckless nuclear war exercises, mindful of the miserable and fatal consequences to be entailed in the future. 
					
					 Ri Yong Hun, chairman of the Kanagawa Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, warned that the U.S. and south Korean warmongers will face miserable defeat if they finally lead the situation of the Korean peninsula to a war. 
					
					 Mun Kwang Hui, chairperson of the Aichi Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, stressed that the U.S. and south Korean warmongers should stop at once the reckless racket for aggression and urged the U.S. imperialist aggression forces to withdraw from south Korea immediately.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Discloses Absurdity of U.S. "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Discloses Absurdity of U.S. "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- "There are neither jobless people nor homeless ones in the DPRK where free compulsory education and free health care are in force. Question is why the West describes it as a 'criminal country.' It is because it has not abandoned its socialism. The U.S. seeks to bring down its socialist system and convert it into capitalism."
					 This is a paragraph of an article recently carried by the Bulgarian paper Novo Rabotnichesko Delo.
					
					 This can be viewed as a fair comment on the true human rights situation in the DPRK and on the sinister purpose sought by the U.S. and other Western countries to hurt and take issue with it.
					
					 The anti-DPRK "human rights" racket being kicked up by the U.S. and its followers is no more than a deceptive farce abusing the name of human rights as it is a sinister act aimed to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The hostile forces seem to be displeased with the fact that the Korean people are guaranteed all rights that can be enjoyed only by a privileged few in their countries.
					
					 In another word, they are desperately working to bring down the socialist system of the DPRK that can prove the nature of the capitalist society where the fundamentals of existence are decided by the jungle law only and monopoly plutocrats who account for just one percent of the population own most of wealth.
					
					 Having such abnormal repugnancy and inveterate bad blood toward the socialist system, the hostile forces are leaving no means untried to distort the reality in the DPRK and slander it. 
					
					 They let all reactionary propaganda means work round the clock to slander the DPRK. Last year they ran the whole gamut of base acts to make sure that the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" was railroaded through a UN session on the basis of what they called "testimonies." 
					
					 But their absurdity has been brought to light.
					
					 A U.S. army officer who had once visited the DPRK as a member of the group for finding remains of GIs told a group of U.S. lawyers who was on a visit to the DPRK in the same period that he had been told when leaving Hawaii for the DPRK that it is a veritable hell on earth but while staying there, he could realize that it is good to live in and what he heard from Western media and his seniors were all sheer lies.
					
					 As far as the above-said "testimonies" are concerned, they were all made by human scum who defected from the DPRK after committing crimes against it and its people. As Sin Tong Hyok who had taken the lead in making such "testimonies" confessed that he had made false testimonies, many countries are getting skeptical about the "human rights resolution" against the DPRK. 
					
					 As seen above, the "human rights" racket being kicked up by the U.S. and other Western countries is run through with fabrications, from A to Z.
					
					 The anti-DPRK "human rights" racket of the U.S. and its followers to falsify truth even in the UN arena is, indeed, an unpardonable challenge and mockery of justice and human conscience.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the U.S. justify its absurd anti-DPRK "human rights" racket.
					
					 The DPRK will certainly settle accounts with the U.S. for the crimes it committed by distorting the former's human rights situation and encroaching upon its sovereignty.

articles.title: Military Confrontation Is Left as Only Option in Inter-Korean Relations: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Military Confrontation Is Left as Only Option in Inter-Korean Relations: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- There is no need to deal with the south Korean warmongers who challenge the DPRK's sincere efforts for dialogue and improved relations. This is the final conclusion drawn by it.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday says this in an article in this regard. It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet group kicked off Key Resolve and Foal Eagle military drills in league with the U.S. despite the unanimous protest and denunciation by the Korean nation. The on-going saber-rattling is an unpardonable insult and blatant challenge to the DPRK's positive efforts for the north-south dialogue and improved relations.
					
					 The puppet forces are claiming that there will be detente in the inter-Korean relations once the joint military drills are over. This is nothing but a cunning trick to escape from the public criticism at home and abroad for driving the inter-Korean relations into the worst phase.
					
					 Owing to this, the inter-Korean relations have undergone ordeals for several decades and this vicious cycle of deterioration of the inter-Korean relations should not be allowed to repeat itself any longer.
					
					 It is quite obvious that the DPRK can hardly have any hope or expectation for dialogue and improved relations now that the south Korean puppet warmongers kicked off the provocative military drills for invading the DPRK in league with the U.S.
					
					 This is also the belief the DPRK came to have after watching the south Korean authorities with a lot of generosity towards them for the past two years.
					
					 What is left in the inter-Korean relations is only the final settlement, military confrontation.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group will have to bitterly experience the miserable consequences to be entailed by its joint military drills it kicked off to challenge the DPRK's sincere efforts for inter-Korean dialogue and improved relations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Shutting Door of DPRK-U.S. Dialogue
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Shutting Door of DPRK-U.S. Dialogue
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is the arch criminal which shut the door of DPRK-U.S. dialogue by deliberately straining the situation on the Korean peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 This is clearly proved by the past history and present situation.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to oppose the stand-off of force and provide a peaceful climate on the Korean peninsula through dialogue and negotiations.
					
					 The DPRK advanced various proposals for dialogue on its own initiative for ensuring peace since the ceasefire in Korea.
					
					 Thanks to the DPRK's efforts, there took place not a few contacts and dialogues between the DPRK and the U.S. in the past period.
					
					 The DPRK exercised patience for the hard-won dialogue when the U.S. rattled its nerves.
					
					 But, the U.S. attitude and stand were completely different to the DPRK' attitude. Whenever the DPRK proposed dialogue, the U.S. put up preconditions, fanning up enmity through false propaganda.
					
					 While paying lip-service to DPRK-U.S. dialogue and peace on the peninsula in the international arena, the U.S. staged war rehearsals in denial of dialogue. They were escalated day by day.
					
					 This goes to prove that no dialogue can take place between the DPRK and the U.S. as long as the latter's saber-rattling persists.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the U.S. pulls up the DPRK while talking about dialogue. This is no more than a fig-leaf to cover up its sinister intention.
					
					 The final purpose sought by the U.S. is to stifle the DPRK by force by whiling away time under the signboard of dialogue.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the U.S. cover up its true colors as a wrecker of dialogue.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Discloses Wretched Plight of Women Workers
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Discloses Wretched Plight of Women Workers
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea carried an editorial on Mar. 9 disclosing the wretched plight of the women workers.
					 They staged actions to achieve rights of women on March 8, the International Women's Day, it noted, adding:
					
					 There is still red light as regards the rights and positions of women workers in south Korea. Their social positions and wages are the world's lowest. 
					
					 More miserable is the plight of part-time women workers. 57.3 percent of the women workers are part timers. 28 percent of them receive wages less than the minimum wages. 
					
					 The paper called for putting a prompt end to the discrimination and violence against women.
					
					 It urged the regime to immediately roll back the anti-labor policy towards women.

articles.title: South Korean Media Reveals Dangerous Nature of Key Resolve
articles.content:
South Korean Media Reveals Dangerous Nature of Key Resolve
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- An article titled "Reason why Key Resolve this year is more dangerous" was posted on the south Korean internet paper Voice of People on March 4.
					 The article noted that after the start of Key Resolve joint military drill, the situation on the Korean peninsula is getting further strained.
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 The joint military drill this year might bring more serious consequences than ever before.
					
					 The first reason is that the dangerous nature of the U.S. high-handed policy towards the DPRK is brought to light and the conflict between the DPRK and the U.S. is mounting. 
					
					 The other reason is that the Park Geun Hye regime entered its third year without any success in the south-north relations.
					
					 It is clear as pikestaff that Key Resolve will trigger off protest from the DPRK and a vicious cycle of tension on the Korean peninsula now that the DPRK-U.S. confrontation is festering and there is no way out for the south-north relations. 
					
					 The article urged the authorities to pay heed to the public voices calling for a stop to the joint military drill.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Authorities' Moves against DPRK Accused by German Body
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Authorities' Moves against DPRK Accused by German Body
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany sent a protest letter to the south Korean puppet embassy in Berlin on March 5 in denunciation of the U.S. and south Korean authorities' human rights racket against the DPRK and their joint military exercises for aggression.
					 The letter strongly accused the south Korean authorities of conducting "human rights" campaign against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. by abusing the UN name.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 This is apparently a wanton encroachment on the interests of all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad.
					
					 South Korea is not a sovereign and independent state in the true sense of words as it has been under the U.S. occupation for 70 years with even the command of its armed forces in the hands of the latter.
					
					 The DPRK's powerful nuclear deterrent is a clear answer to the U.S. moves to stifle it.
					
					 It is the right and duty of all the states to defend their own country and people.
					
					 Some time ago, the DPRK clarified that it has a will to take a measure to respond to the U.S. suspension of joint military exercises in south Korea and its vicinity with a moratorium on the nuclear test.
					
					 The arch criminals escalating tension on the Korean peninsula are just the U.S. and the south Korean authorities colluding with it.
					
					 We resolutely denounce all sorts of arbitrariness attributable to the political conflict and provocations against the DPRK being made under the pretext of "democracy", "freedom" and "human rights".

articles.title: British Organizations Support DPRK's Will to Punish U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers
articles.content:
British Organizations Support DPRK's Will to Punish U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK on March 3 made public a joint statement in support of the statement of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK). 
					 The statement recalled that the CPRK in its statement strongly warned the U.S. and south Korean puppet group of the disastrous consequences to be entailed by their madcap drills for aggression against the DPRK. 
					
					 This year the DPRK called for bringing about a great turn and change in the inter-Korean relations and opening up a wide avenue to independent reunification and repeatedly demanded south Korea stop all the war drills with the U.S., the joint statement said, adding:
					
					 The CPRK in its statement said the prevailing situation clearly proves once again that the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces are the arch criminals disturbing peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and screwing up the tension in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The U.S. is the root cause of creating constant tension on the Korean peninsula and the south Korean puppet forces' unconditional servility and pursuance of the U.S. are their inveterate mode of existence. 
					
					 We fully support the DPRK's will to severely punish the aggressors. 
					
					 We call upon the peace-loving people of the world to fully support the just struggle of the Korean people to cope with the moves of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean authorities for a new war.

articles.title: Just Actions of Army and People of DPRK to Defend Sovereignty of Country Supported in Benin
articles.content:
Just Actions of Army and People of DPRK to Defend Sovereignty of Country Supported in Benin
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, chairman of the Socialist Party of Benin, issued a statement on Mar. 4 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces for their large-scale joint military drills now underway against the DPRK.
					 He said that Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills are an undisguised infringement upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK as they are rehearsals for a war of aggression and a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to have tighter grip on south Korea, stand in the way of the process for improving the ties between the north and the south of Korea, lay a siege to its surrounding countries and contain them and steadily escalate the tension on the Korean peninsula through ceaseless military drills in a bid to secure a pretext for beefing up its forces in the Asia-Pacific region, he noted, adding:
					
					 Now that the U.S. is becoming reckless and extremely desperate in the implementation of its hostile policy toward the DPRK, the latter declared that it would intensify counteraction of justice to smash it.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the army and the people of the DPRK would surely win a final victory in the struggle for defending the sovereignty of the country.

articles.title: Nigerian and German Organizations Call for Halting Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Nigerian and German Organizations Call for Halting Joint Military Drills
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Nigerian and German organizations issued statements in denunciation of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' joint military drills.
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association in a statement on Mar. 4 said that the DPRK has made sincere efforts to remove the danger of war, defuse the tension and provide a peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the U.S. kicked off Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills, a war rehearsal for aggression, against the DPRK together with the south Korean puppet forces despite strong protest and denunciation at home and abroad, it noted, adding:
					
					 We call for an immediate halt to the joint military drills that push the situation on the peninsula to a dangerous war phase.
					
					 The German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association on Mar. 5 said that the U.S. and south Korea imposed sanctions upon the DPRK and kicked off vicious human rights smear campaign and, meanwhile, staged again the joint military drills aimed at a preemptive attack. This means they opted for confrontation, not dialogue.
					
					 The U.S. purpose is the "collapse" of the socialist system in the DPRK, it noted, adding:
					
					 The DPRK wants peace, but it is compelled to take a relevant measure to cope with the enemies' moves.
					
					 All forms of provocations against the DPRK must be halted.

articles.title: Masikryong Ski Resort Introduced by Media of Russia, Germany
articles.content:
Masikryong Ski Resort Introduced by Media of Russia, Germany
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Russian and German media introduced the Masikryong Ski Resort in the DPRK. 
					 TASS of Russia said on March 8 that a Pyongyang-Masikryong regular bus service began in the DPRK. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The ski resort built on the initiative of supreme leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un has 10 skiing courses. 
					
					 Visitors can ski even night along the brightly-lit courses. 
					
					 This is the best winter resort as Masik Pass has favorable weather and climate. 
					
					 The ski resort attracts a lot of ski fans in the DPRK. 
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted an article titled "Masikryong Ski Resort" on its internet homepage on March 6. 
					
					 The article said: 
					
					 A world-class ski resort appeared on Masik Pass of the DPRK little known before, drawing keen attention of the international community. 
					
					 A hotel, buildings for skiing service and lodging houses were built there in a peculiar style. It attracts visitors not only as a ski resort but also as a tourist destination. 
					
					 The ski resort will attract more visitors in the future.

articles.title: Halt to Key Resolve and Foal Eagle Demanded by Beninese Bodies
articles.content:
Halt to Key Resolve and Foal Eagle Demanded by Beninese Bodies
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on March 5 in denunciation of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces' joint military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle for aggression.
					 The statement said that an extremely grave situation is now prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the U.S. and south Korean authorities' reckless war exercises.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The present situation once again clearly proves that the U.S. and its lackeys, south Korean authorities, are the arch criminals disturbing peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and escalating tension in Northeast Asia.
					
					 We vehemently condemn the U.S. and south Korean authorities' dangerous Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					
					 The world peace-loving people should pay deep attention to the grave situation on the Korean peninsula and become more vocal denouncing the U.S. and south Korean authorities' saber-rattling.
					
					 The final victory is in store for the army and people of the DPRK all out in the struggle for accomplishing the just cause.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Dominican Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Dominican Party Leader
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Jose Miguel Mejia, secretary general of the United Left Movement of Dominica, praised the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung at the inaugural ceremony of the Dominican preparatory committee for celebrating his birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun) held on March. 4.
					 He said that Kim Il Sung was the greatest man and elder statesman whom no famous man in the world could match.
					
					 He accomplished the historic cause of national liberation on August 15, 1945 through a protracted struggle against the Japanese imperialists, the secretary general said, adding:
					
					 He was a genius of military affairs as he wisely led the army and people of the DPRK to inflict a disgraceful defeat upon the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world.
					
					 He was also a genius of construction as he turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 His life was a heroic one dedicated to building a rich and powerful country, bringing its people happiness, defending the sovereignty of the country and achieving national reunification. 
					
					 The respected Comrade Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause started and advanced by the preceding leaders.
					
					 We will positively support the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Dominica
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Dominica
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- A Dominican preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Santo Domingo on March 4.
					 Jose Miguel Mejia, secretary general of the United Left Movement of Dominica, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising the sacred revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Corea y Rusia declaran 2015 como ano de amistad entre dos paises
articles.content:
Corea y Rusia declaran 2015 como ano de amistad entre dos paises
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- A partir del objetivo de desarrollar en la nueva etapa segun el acuerdo mutuo las relaciones entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Federacion Rusa en las esferas politica, economica, cultural, etc., los dos paises decidieron declarar como ano de amistad RPDC-FR 2015 en que se cumplen en Corea el 70o aniversario de la Liberacion de la Patria y en Rusia el 70o de la victoria en la Gran Guerra Patria.
					Durante este ano, ambos paises activaran el intercambio de delegaciones y el contacto entre los organos estatales y regionales y organizaran actividades culturales conjuntas en Pyongyang, Moscu y otras ciudades de la RPDC y la FR.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Mauricio
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Mauricio
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 6 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Mauricio, Rajkeshwur Purryag, con motivo del 47o aniversario de la independencia y el 23o aniversario de proclamacion de la Republica de Mauricio.
					En la misiva, el remitente expreso la conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran en varias ramas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises y formulo sinceros votos por los exitos en los esfuerzos del destinatario, el gobierno y el pueblo de Mauricio por el progreso y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: RPDC castigara implacablemente a ofensores a la maxima dignidad, advierte CRPP
articles.content:
RPDC castigara implacablemente a ofensores a la maxima dignidad, advierte CRPP
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en ocasion de la punalada al embajador estadounidense, en el Sur de Corea se tornan cada dia mas feroz la campana de purga de "fuerzas pro-Norte" y la confrontacion con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 10 la informacion no.1086 que senala como sigue:
					La banda titere surcoreana instiga cada dia a los gangsteres conservadores ultraderechistas a organizar la supuesta "reunion nacional de condena a las fuerzas pro-Norte", levantando asi una gran ola de confrontacion anti-RPDC.
					
					En particular, los cadaveres vivos de la "Alianza de Padres" y los gangsteres conservadores ultraderechistas de la "Asociacion de Victimas de Defoliante" se aglomeraron en el lugar centrico de Seul para difamar la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Esto es una gran provocacion insoportable contra la RPDC y un crimen imperdonable nunca visto.
					
					Esta intencion malsana persigue adular a su amo norteamericano, exterminar las fuerzas patrioticas pro-reunificacion, acabar con el aliento de independencia antiyanqui y antigubernamental que se aumenta cada dia mas entre los habitantes y recurrir mas a la confrontacion anti-RPDC.
					
					En este mundo no hay los traidores pronorteamericanos, maniacos conflictivos y  fascistas como la banda titere.
					
					Las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC ya expusieron su decision rotunda de no perdonar y eliminar de esta tierra a los ofensores a la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, mas preciosa que la vida.
					
					Los provocadores deben tenerlo presente y actuar con prudencia.

articles.title: ACNC comenta caracter absurdo de la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
ACNC comenta caracter absurdo de la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- "En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea no hay desempleado ni vagabundo. Se practican las politicas sociales tales como el sistema de ensenanza obligatoria gratuita y el de asistencia medica gratuita. Entonces, ?por que el Occidente acusa a la RPDC de criminal? Es que este pais no abandona el socialismo. Estados Unidos trata de derrumbar el socialismo de la RPDC y conducirla al capitalismo."
					Esto es un parrafo del articulo divulgado recientemente por el periodico bulgaro Novo Rabotnichesko Delo.
					
					Se puede decir que es una evaluacion imparcial sobre el verdadero estado de derechos humanos de la RPDC y sobre el siniestro objetivo de EE.UU. y las fuerzas occidentales que la difaman.
					
					La campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC que libran EE.UU. y sus satelites deviene una farsa encaminada a aplastar el regimen socialista de la RPDC.
					
					Las fuerzas hostiles estan disgustadas por el hecho de que el pueblo coreano ejerce todos los derechos que en los respectivos paises corresponden solo a la clase privilegiada.
					
					Mejor dicho, se enfrascan en exterminar el regimen socialista de la RPDC que sirve de comparacion para revelar la esencia de sociedad capitalista donde la base de existencia se decide por la ley de selva y todos los bienes son propiedades de los monopolistas que ocupan 1% de la poblacion
					
					Tal sentimiento negativo y hostil de las fuerzas hostiles sobre el regimen socialista hace no reparar en los medios ni metodos para tergiversar e insultar la realidad feliz de la RPDC.
					
					Se movilizan todos los medios de propaganda en la demagogia contra la RPDC. En el ano pasado, hicieron todo lo posible por adoptar una "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC en la ONU a base de los "testimonios" falsos.
					
					Pero quedo desenmascarada la falsedad de tales maniobras.
					
					Un oficial norteamericano, quien habia visitado a la RPDC en calidad de miembro de la delegacion de investigacion sobre los restos mortales de tropas estadounidenses, dijo asi a la comitiva de los abogados norteamericanos que vinieron en el mismo tiempo a la RPDC: "Cuando salimos de Hawai para aca (RPDC), escuchamos que el Norte de Corea es infierno de este Planeta. Pero no fue correcta ninguna de las palabras que oimos. Aqui es un lugar agradable. Todo lo que escuchamos de los medios del Occidente y en boca de nuestros superiores fueron mentiras puras."
					
					Los susodichos "testimonios" se basan en las palabras dichas por unas escorias humanas que huyeron del pais tras cometer crimenes ante el pais y el pueblo,
					
					Para colmo, Sin Tong Hyok, figura clave de los "testigos", reconocio la falsedad de sus declaraciones. Por eso, muchos paises expresan sospechas sobre la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC.
					
					Como se ve, la campana de DDHH anti-RPDC esta caracterizada por los inventos.
					
					EE.UU. y sus satelites intentan tergiversar la realidad hasta en la sagrada escena de la ONU, lo cual resulta un desafio y burla intolerables a la justicia y conciencia de la humanidad.
					
					EE.UU. y las fuerzas occidentales no pueden justificar por nada su campana de DDHH.
					
					Sera liquidado sin falta ese crimen de DDHH anti-RPDC de las fuerzas hostiles, orientado a violar los DDHH y la soberania nacional de la RPDC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun culpa a EE.UU. de ruptura de dialogo con la RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun culpa a EE.UU. de ruptura de dialogo con la RPDC
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- La historia y la realidad de hoy comprueban que Estados Unidos es el culpable que cerro las puertas del dialogo con la RPDC agravando intencionalmente la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este miercoles y continua:
					
					Rechazar el enfrentamiento de fuerzas y preparar el ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana a traves del dialogo y negociaciones, esto la posicion invariable de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Desde el fin de la pasada guerra coreana hasta la fecha, la RPDC presento con iniciativa varias propuestas de dialogo para asegurar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Gracias a los esfuerzos de ella, hubo no pocos contactos y dialogos entre la RPDC y EE.UU.
					
					Para preservar el dialogo dificilmente preparado, la primera actuo con paciencia aunque el segundo cometia actos provocativos.
					
					Pero la posicion y la actitud del imperio fueron totalmente diferentes.
					
					Cada vez que la RPDC proponia el dialogo, EE.UU. presentaba condiciones injustas e inculcaba la hostilidad con su demagogia.
					
					Abogando con hipocresia en la arena internacional por el dialogo con la RPDC y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, libro con frecuencia los ejercicios de guerra negando el mismo dialogo.
					
					Esto demuestra que mientras prosigan los ejercicios belicos de EE.UU., no se abrira ningun dialogo entre ambas partes.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. calumnia a la RPDC en el tema de dialogo, lo cual no pasa de ser una cortina de humo para encubrir su naturaleza de estropeador de dialogo.
					
					Su meta final reside en pasar el tiempo bajo el rotulo de dialogo y aplastar en lo militar a la RPDC cuando tenga la oportunidad.
					
					EE.UU. no podra encubrir nunca su atributo de destructor de dialogo.

articles.title: Japon debe reconocer e indemnizar crimen antietico, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japon debe reconocer e indemnizar crimen antietico, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- Los recien publicados datos de interrogacion de un miembro del viejo ejercito japones capturado por las "fuerzas combinadas" en el periodo de la guerra del Pacifico, devienen otra prueba que comprueba con datos el crimen de esclavitud  sexual de los imperialistas japoneses.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					La historia de la humanidad registra numerosos episodios de la guerra, pero no tiene precedente como el caso del imperialismo japones que convirtio a muchas mujeres de otras naciones en las victimas del crimen de esclavitud sexual.
					
					Quien cometio un delito, debe disculpar y pagar precio por el respecto.
					
					Es natural que Japon reconozca sinceramente e indemnice merecidamente el crimen antietico de gran tamano.
					
					Pero, Japon se desespera por negar y tergiversar la historia.
					
					El fuego no puede estar escondido ni encerrado.
					
					El hecho historico no se puede borrar ni encubrir.
					
					El crimen antietico no tiene prescripcion.
					
					La historia llena de crimenes imperdonables cometidos por los imperialistas japoneses contra la nacion coreana, centuplica el sentimiento de indignacion con el paso de tiempo.
					
					Japon debe abandonar cuanto antes su politica erronea, reconocer e disculpar sinceramente el crimen del pasado aunque sea tarde e indemnizarlo suficientemente.
